CustomField.description:
Field is populated by the "AlumniUtilities" Apex Class.
It was created to make it easier to report on alumni positive outcomes numbers at set intervals after graduation. e.g., what % of alumni were a positive outcome 2 weeks after graduation? What about 10 weeks after? The syntax is:
Weeknum:PosOutcome:Employed:FT School;
where Weeknum is the # of weeks after graduation, and the next 3 fields are each a 1 or a 0 based on whether the grad was a positive outcome, was employed, or was in FT school or training that week.
CustomField.label: Weekly Outcomes
